server

Class ModelManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.ModelManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IModelManager

    public class ModelManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IModelManager
    Java class used to receive the information delivered by the client and wrap them in a format readable for the rest of the system (Package) so that it can perform the correct command, or the action intended, according to the respectful client wishes;

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModelManager()
      Constructor for the ModelManager object; Initializes the DatabaseConnectionTier2 object variable;

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String addItems(Party party) 
      java.lang.String addPeople(Party party)
      Method used to add new participants to a Party object stored in the system; A Package object is being created with the command "addPeople" and the parameter is being added/attached to the Package; It then refers to the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable that transmits the Package command for execution.
      java.lang.String addPerson(Party party) 
      java.lang.String answerInvitation(Invitation invitation)
      Method used to change the status of an invitation stored in the system; A Package object is being created and the parameter is being added/attached to the Package; If the Invitation parameter status is "accepted", the Package command is set to "acceptInvite", and "declineInvite" otherwise; It then refers to the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable that transmits the Package command for execution.
      Party createParty(Party party)
      Method used to create a new Party in the system.
      java.util.List<Invitation> getInvitations(int personID)
      Method used to retrieve the Notifications/Invitations of a user/Person in the system specified by the parameter; A Package object is being created with the command "getInvitations" and the parameter is being added/attached to the Package; It then refers to the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable that transmits the Package command for execution.
      java.util.List<Item> getItems(int partyId) 
      java.util.List<Party> getParties(Person person)
      Method used to retrieve the Parties of a specific person/user of the system (either he/she participates or hostess the party); A Package object is being created with the command "getPartiesForPerson" and the parameter is being added/attached to the Package; It then refers to the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable that transmits the Package command for execution.
      Person login(Person person)
      Method used for verification the credentials of a user that attempts to login; A Package object is being created with the command "login" and the parameter is being added/attached to the Package; It then refers to the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable that transmits the Package command for execution.
      Person registerPerson(Person person)
      Method used to register a new User of the system; A Package object is being created with the command "registerPerson" and the parameter is being added/attached to the Package; It then refers to the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable that transmits the Package command for execution.
      java.lang.String removeItems(Party party) 
      java.util.List<Person> searchPersonBySomething(java.lang.String smth)
      Method used in retrieving users that met a specific criteria specified by the parameter; A Package object is being created with the command "searchPBySmth" and the parameter is being added/attached to the Package; It then refers to the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable that transmits the Package command for execution.
      boolean setPartyPrivacy(boolean privacy, Party party) 
      Party updateParty(BoxTier2 box)
      Method used for updating/ modifying a Party object stored by the system; Changes include: -add items; -remove Items; -add people -remove people For each of the procedures a Package object is created with a respectable command and the needed objects needed for the execution of the procedure are set; In case of add people an invitation will be created instead; If the case one of the procedures fails (result is an Exception thrown) the method will return null; Lastly the method attempt to retrieve the modified Party using the same set of actions;
      Party updatePartyD(Party party)
      Method used to make modifications to the details of a certain Party of the system; A Package object is being created with the command "updatePartyD" and the parameter is being added/attached to the Package; It then refers to the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable that transmits the Package command for execution.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • updateParty

        public Party updateParty(BoxTier2 box)
        Method used for updating/ modifying a Party object stored by the system; Changes include: -add items; -remove Items; -add people -remove people For each of the procedures a Package object is created with a respectable command and the needed objects needed for the execution of the procedure are set; In case of add people an invitation will be created instead; If the case one of the procedures fails (result is an Exception thrown) the method will return null; Lastly the method attempt to retrieve the modified Party using the same set of actions;
        Parameters:
        box -
        Returns:
        Party

      • searchPersonBySomething

        public java.util.List<Person> searchPersonBySomething(java.lang.String smth)
        Method used in retrieving users that met a specific criteria specified by the parameter; A Package object is being created with the command "searchPBySmth" and the parameter is being added/attached to the Package; It then refers to the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable that transmits the Package command for execution. The result received by the ModelManager through the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable is either a List or null if the procedure a) failed and was aborted or b) no match was found
        Parameters:
        smth -
        Returns:
        List

      • addPerson

        public java.lang.String addPerson(Party party)

      • addPeople

        public java.lang.String addPeople(Party party)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Method used to add new participants to a Party object stored in the system; A Package object is being created with the command "addPeople" and the parameter is being added/attached to the Package; It then refers to the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable that transmits the Package command for execution. The result received by the ModelManager through the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable is either a String "success" or a String "fail" if the procedure failed and was aborted at some point
        Parameters:
        party -
        Returns:
        String
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • createParty

        public Party createParty(Party party)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Method used to create a new Party in the system. A Package object is being created with the command "createParty" and the parameter is being added/attached to the Package; It then refers to the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable that transmits the Package command for execution. The result received by the ModelManager through the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable is either a Party object (with persistence only generated data) or null if the procedure failed and was aborted at some point
        Parameters:
        party -
        Returns:
        Party
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • registerPerson

        public Person registerPerson(Person person)
        Method used to register a new User of the system; A Package object is being created with the command "registerPerson" and the parameter is being added/attached to the Package; It then refers to the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable that transmits the Package command for execution. The result received by the ModelManager through the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable is either a Person object (with persistence only generated data) or null if the procedure failed and was aborted at some point
        Parameters:
        person -
        Returns:
        Person

      • login

        public Person login(Person person)
        Method used for verification the credentials of a user that attempts to login; A Package object is being created with the command "login" and the parameter is being added/attached to the Package; It then refers to the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable that transmits the Package command for execution. The result received by the ModelManager through the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable is either a Person object (with persistence only generated data) or null if a)the procedure failed and was aborted at some point b) the credentials provided by the parameter don't match with those from the system
        Parameters:
        person -
        Returns:
        Person

      • getParties

        public java.util.List<Party> getParties(Person person)
        Method used to retrieve the Parties of a specific person/user of the system (either he/she participates or hostess the party); A Package object is being created with the command "getPartiesForPerson" and the parameter is being added/attached to the Package; It then refers to the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable that transmits the Package command for execution. The result received by the ModelManager through the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable is either a List object (with persistence only generated data) or null if the procedure failed and was aborted at some point
        Parameters:
        person -
        Returns:

      • answerInvitation

        public java.lang.String answerInvitation(Invitation invitation)
        Method used to change the status of an invitation stored in the system; A Package object is being created and the parameter is being added/attached to the Package; If the Invitation parameter status is "accepted", the Package command is set to "acceptInvite", and "declineInvite" otherwise; It then refers to the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable that transmits the Package command for execution. The result received by the ModelManager through the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable is either a String "success" or a String "fail" if the procedure failed and was aborted at some point
